1.2.name: wordpress/qurify-qr-code-widget
1.2.description:
Qurify and display whatever QR Code you want and (optional) let your visitors qurify their own QR Codes, directly on your blog! Features

*  Simple
*  Customizable
*  Widget support
*  No options page (yes, its a feature)
*  Uses Wordpress resources (no extra files needed)

Usage

If you use WordPress widgets, just drag the widget into your sidebar and configure. Be sure to have activated the plugin in your Plugin Settings.
